qas.question: What year was Charles Town founded?
How long did it take to establish settlement expeditions for the Province of Carolina?
What was the plan to settle and develop the Province of Carolina?
Who prepared the plan known as "the Grand Model"?
When was Charles II of England restored to the throne?
What year was Charles Town abandoned?
How long did it take to establish settlement expeditions for the Province of South Carolina?
Who rejected the plan known as "the Grand Model"?
What was the plan to settle and develop the State of Carolina?
When was Charles I of England restored to the throne?

context: After Charles II of England (1630–1685) was restored to the English throne in <a4_0><b9_0>1660<b9_0/><a4_0/> following Oliver Cromwell's Protectorate, he granted the chartered Province of Carolina to eight of his loyal friends, known as the Lords Proprietors, on March 24, 1663. It took <a1_0><b6_0>seven years<b6_0/><a1_0/> before the group arranged for settlement expeditions. The first of these founded Charles Town, in <a0_0><b5_0>1670<a0_0/>.<b5_0/> Governance, settlement, and development were to follow a visionary plan known as <a2_0><b8_0>the Grand Model<b8_0/><a2_0/> prepared for the Lords Proprietors by <a3_0><b7_0>John Locke<b7_0/><a3_0/>.
